mapper.sql: USER_INFO_ID as userInfoId, BIND_ACCOUNT as bindAccount, LOGIN_NAME as loginName, PASSWORD as password, COUNTRY as country, PROVINCE as province, CITY as city, NICKNAME as nickname, SEX as sex, MOBILE_PHONE as mobilePhone, USER_TYPE as userType, REGISTER_IP_ADDRESS as registerIpAddress, REGISTER_TIME as registerTime, LAST_LOGIN_TIME as lastLoginTime, SOURCE as source, RECOMMEND_ID as recommendId, RANK as rank, HEAD_IMG_PATH as headImgPath, IS_BROKER as isBroker, BROKER_USER_ID as brokerUserId, REFERER_USER_ID as refererUserId
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from user_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info (BIND_ACCOUNT, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, NICKNAME, SEX, MOBILE_PHONE, USER_TYPE, REGISTER_IP_ADDRESS, REGISTER_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, SOURCE, RECOMMEND_ID, RANK, HEAD_IMG_PATH, IS_BROKER, BROKER_USER_ID, REFERER_USER_ID) values (#{bindAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerIpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommendId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isBroker,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brokerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{refererUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
